name.description: Either the name of an existing image, or the name to give to the new image

description.description: The description to use for the image.

owner.description: The owner of the image. This can be the name of a user or a group.

visibility.description: Who should be allowed to use the image.

hardware_type.description: What hardware type the image version should be run on.

supports.description: [FUTURE RELEASE] Types of resource that the image supports

name.description: The name of the image version

description.description: The description of the image version

build_data.description: [FUTURE RELEASE] Details for when building an image using the Saturn Cloud build pipeline

base_image_uri.description: The base image to build from

conda_environment.description: Contents of a conda environment yaml

apt_packages.description: Packages to install from apt-get install

post_build.description: A shell script to execute as the last step

use_mamba.description: Whether to use mamba when installing via conda.

archived.description: Whether the image is archived. When an image is archived it cannot be used for new resources.

image_uri.description: Location of the image. Required for externally-built images. If set to null then [FUTURE RELEASE] the image will be built according to build data.

schema_version.description: The version of the schema used. Typically associated with a Saturn Cloud version
